strategicRequirements.label: Objective
strategicRequirements.value: Develop A Digital Transformation Strategy Aligned With The Organization's Strategy And The Objectives Of Saudi Vision 2030.

strategicRequirements.label: Implementation Requirements
strategicRequirements.value: Prepare A Digital Transformation Strategy For The Transition To Electronic Government Transactions, Including The Following:
items: The Organization’s Vision, Mission, Strategic Pillars, And Strategic Objectives, And Their Alignment With The Organization’s Overall Strategy.
Strategic Initiatives, Programs, And Performance Indicators.
A Clear Methodology For Integration And Coordination With Relevant External Entities To Achieve The Strategy’s Objectives.
Required Competencies, Capabilities, And Skills Necessary To Achieve The Strategy’s Objectives.

strategicRequirements.label: Evidence Documents
strategicRequirements.value: Submit The Approved Digital Transformation Strategy That Includes All The Requirements Of This Standard, Provided That It Has Been Approved Within A Period Not Exceeding 36 Months.

strategicRequirements.label: Related Regulations
strategicRequirements.value: Council Of Ministers Resolution No.(40) Dated 27/2/1427H, Clause (16).
